translated: But if so, then existence and mere nonexistence, which are ascertained, are also mutually implied, so it follows that mere nonexistence would also be ascertained.

original: nges pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: nges pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúAscertained,‚Äù

original: de nges par gzung ba'i dag tu bstan pas 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de nges par gzung ba'i dag tu bstan pas 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no //
translated: because it is taught that they are ascertained, they are not mere nonexistence.

original: 'on kyang lhan cig pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'on kyang lhan cig pa nyid kyis so //
translated: But they are coexistent.

original: gang las she na nges pa na nges par gzung ba'i ngag ni gnyi ga'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang las she na nges pa na nges par gzung ba'i ngag ni gnyi ga'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: From what? Because the words ‚Äúascertained‚Äù and ‚Äúascertainment‚Äù have the nature of both.

original: nges na de ltar thun mong du brjod pas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa 'ba' zhig brjod pas de'i nang du 'du bas gnyi ga rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: nges na de ltar thun mong du brjod pas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa 'ba' zhig brjod pas de'i nang du 'du bas gnyi ga rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Since they are expressed in this way in common, by expressing mere forward and reverse pervasion, they are included in that, so both are understood.

original: 'on kyang phan tshun nang du 'du bar gyur pa nyid lhan cig tu tshig gcig gis brjod pa yin no zhes mjug bsdu ba ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba smos so de nyid la mthun pa'i phyogs kho na la yod pa zhes bya ba 'dis mthun pa'i phyogsüîΩla yod pa brjod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang phan tshun nang du 'du bar gyur pa nyid lhan cig tu tshig gcig gis brjod pa yin no zhes mjug bsdu ba ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba smos so de nyid la mthun pa'i phyogs kho na la yod pa zhes bya ba 'dis mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa brjod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: but rather by the words ‚Äúonly in the similar class.‚Äù

original: 'on kyang de lta na mthun pa'i phyogs med pa yang yin nam de bzhin cig shos kyis kyang ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang de lta na mthun pa'i phyogs med pa yang yin nam de bzhin cig shos kyis kyang ste /
translated: However, in that case, is there no similar class?

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa kho na zhes bya ba'i tshig gis med pa nyid 'ba' zhig brjod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa kho na zhes bya ba'i tshig gis med pa nyid 'ba' zhig brjod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The words ‚Äúonly in the dissimilar class‚Äù do not state nonexistence alone.

original: 'on kyang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pas kyang yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pas kyang yin te /
translated: However, there is also existence in the similar class.

original: gang gis 'ba' zhig pa tshig gis yod pa'am med pa de'i bdag nyid kyi gnyis pa 'phen pas so //
analyzed: gang gis 'ba' zhig pa tshig gis yod pa'am med pa de'i bdag nyid kyi gnyis pa 'phen pas so //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù indicates the second, existence or nonexistence, that is projected.

original: gang gi phyir 'dis tha dad par brjod par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir gang gi tshe rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'am med pa tha dad pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ji ltar de las logs shig pa nyid yin /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dis tha dad par brjod par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir gang gi tshe rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'am med pa tha dad pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ji ltar de las logs shig pa nyid yin /
translated: Because it is not said to be different, therefore, when the presence or absence of concomitance or the reverse is a different nature, how can it be separate from that?

original: 'on te nges pa dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byas pa'i de'i ngag gcig pa nyid kyis gnyi ga rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir logs shig tu brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'on te nges pa dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byas pa'i de'i ngag gcig pa nyid kyis gnyi ga rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir logs shig tu brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: Or, because the statement with certainty is the same as the statement of the effect, both are understood, so it should not be stated separately.

original: de byas kyang ma rtogs pa rtogs pa med de /
analyzed: de byas kyang ma rtogs pa rtogs pa med de /
translated: Even if it is done, what is not understood is not understood.

original: 'on kyang sbyor ba nges pa'i don yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: 'on kyang sbyor ba nges pa'i don yin no zhes bshad do //
translated: However, the application has a definite meaning, it is explained.

original: gal te ji lta ba'i rjes su 'gro ba'am ldog pa'i yod pa'i mtshan nyid phan tshun bdag nyid ma yin pa dang / des de gnyis phan tshun tshul gzhan yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: gal te ji lta ba'i rjes su 'gro ba'am ldog pa'i yod pa'i mtshan nyid phan tshun bdag nyid ma yin pa dang / des de gnyis phan tshun tshul gzhan yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: If the characteristic of existence as concomitance or the reverse is not the same as the other, and by that the two are different from each other, then

original: bstan bcos byed pa ni gzhan gyis shes par byed pa yin pas shes pa nyid ni mtshan nyid gsum las tha dad do //
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pa ni gzhan gyis shes par byed pa yin pas shes pa nyid ni mtshan nyid gsum las tha dad do //
translated: Since the treatise is for the sake of causing others to understand, understanding is not included among the three characteristics.

original: de'i nang du 'du bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa de'i phyir tshul gzhan du 'gyur @327a * //üîΩro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i nang du 'du bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa de'i phyir tshul gzhan du 'gyur @327a * // ro zhe na /
translated: If it is not included, then it is a different mode.

original: shes pa ni de ltar zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: shes pa ni de ltar zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Understanding is not like that.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i yod pa dang med pa'i mtshan nyid phan tshun nang du 'du bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du shes pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i yod pa dang med pa'i mtshan nyid phan tshun nang du 'du bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du shes pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The existence and nonexistence of the forward and reverse pervasions are included in each other, but understanding is not like that.

original: gzhan gyis shes par byed pa'i bstan bcos bshad pa'i mtshan nyid gsum gyi nang du ma 'dus pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis shes par byed pa'i bstan bcos bshad pa'i mtshan nyid gsum gyi nang du ma 'dus pa yin te /
translated: Understanding is not included among the three characteristics of the treatise that is for the sake of causing others to understand,

original: gzhan gyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is a different characteristic.

original: gzhan gyis shes par byed pa'i tshul gsum pa'i yul rtogs pa'i 'bras bu yin /
analyzed: gzhan gyis shes par byed pa'i tshul gsum pa'i yul rtogs pa'i 'bras bu yin /
translated: Understanding is the effect of the realization of the object that has the three modes that is for the sake of causing others to understand.

original: bstan bcos de las gang gis tshul gsum pa rtogs pa gang yin pas shes pa ni ma bzung ngo //
analyzed: bstan bcos de las gang gis tshul gsum pa rtogs pa gang yin pas shes pa ni ma bzung ngo //
translated: The treatise does not grasp the understanding that is the realization of the three modes.

original: de'i phyir tha mi dad pa'i shes pa ni ma bzung bas mtshan nyid gsum gyi nang du 'dus so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha mi dad pa'i shes pa ni ma bzung bas mtshan nyid gsum gyi nang du 'dus so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, since consciousness that is not different is not apprehended, the meaning is that it is included among the three characteristics.

original: bas zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te mtshan nyid gsum las tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bas zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te mtshan nyid gsum las tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means because it is not different from the three characteristics.

original: gal te shes pa nyid shes pa'i sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan du bshad pa'i rnam pa kho nar brjod do //
analyzed: gal te shes pa nyid shes pa'i sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan du bshad pa'i rnam pa kho nar brjod do //
translated: If consciousness itself is stated to be the aspect that is the reason for the application of the term consciousness,

original: de'i tshe de'i rtags kyi bdag nyid ma gyur pas de'i mtshan nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i rtags kyi bdag nyid ma gyur pas de'i mtshan nyid ma yin no //
translated: then since it is not the cause of that, it is not its characteristic.

original: yang na shes pa la ltos pa'i las su bya ba shes pa nyid du brjod na de'i tshe yang shes bya yod par rnam par brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan ni shes pa yod pa yin pa'i phyir tshul gsum rnam par gzhag pa kho nas de yod par 'jog par
analyzed: yang na shes pa la ltos pa'i las su bya ba shes pa nyid du brjod na de'i tshe yang shes bya yod par rnam par brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan ni shes pa yod pa yin pa'i phyir tshul gsum rnam par gzhag pa kho nas de yod par 'jog par
translated: Moreover, if the object that is dependent on consciousness is stated to be consciousness, then in that case, since the reason for the statement of the existence of the object is the existence of consciousness, the establishment of the existence of the object is made by the mere establishment of the three modes.

original: byed pa'i shes pa rnams kyang 'phen pa yin no //
analyzed: byed pa'i shes pa rnams kyang 'phen pa yin no //
translated: The consciousnesses that are the means of establishing the existence of the object are also projected.

original: de'i phyir de la ltos kyang las bya ba'i yod pa ni ma brjod kyang grub pas de'i tshig gis logs shig tu brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de la ltos kyang las bya ba'i yod pa ni ma brjod kyang grub pas de'i tshig gis logs shig tu brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, although it is dependent on that, the existence of the object of action is established even without being stated, so its words should not be stated separately.

original: de ltar bstan bcos ni gzhan gyis shes par byed pa'i phyir bshad pas ma bzung ba'i shes pa ni mtshan nyid gsum las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar bstan bcos ni gzhan gyis shes par byed pa'i phyir bshad pas ma bzung ba'i shes pa ni mtshan nyid gsum las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, the treatise is explained in order to make others understand, because the cognition that does not grasp is not different from the three characteristics.

original: de nyid gnod pa med pa'i yul can la sogs pa yin pa'i phyir tshul gsum bsal ba'i mjug bsdu ba ni de lta bas na gtan tshigs mtshan nyid drug ma yin par zhes smos so //
analyzed: de nyid gnod pa med pa'i yul can la sogs pa yin pa'i phyir tshul gsum bsal ba'i mjug bsdu ba ni de lta bas na gtan tshigs mtshan nyid drug ma yin par zhes smos so //
translated: That itself is the subject with an unimpaired object, etc., so the conclusion of the exclusion of the three modes is stated as Therefore, the reason is not six characteristics.

original: de lta na mtshan nyid gsum kho na yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de lta na mtshan nyid gsum kho na yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: Thus, it is said that there are only three characteristics.

original: gtan tshigs thigs pa'i 'grel pa bram ze aa tsa tas rnam par sbyar ba las mtshan nyid drug bshad pa ste bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: gtan tshigs thigs pa'i 'grel pa bram ze aa tsa tas rnam par sbyar ba las mtshan nyid drug bshad pa ste bzhi pa'o /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the six characteristics in the commentary on the Tattva·π≠ƒ´kƒÅ composed by the Brahmin Acatya.

original: // / thub pa nyid ma'i gsung gi rigs pa'i sgron ma yis //
analyzed: // / thub pa nyid ma'i gsung gi rigs pa'i sgron ma yis //
translated: The lamp of reasoning of the speech of the Sage himself

original: rtog ge ngan pa ma lus lam ni zad mdzad pa'i //
analyzed: rtog ge ngan pa ma lus lam ni zad mdzad pa'i //
translated: You have exhausted all bad thoughts and paths.üîΩ

original: 'grel pa 'di yis bsod nams bsags pa gang yin des //
analyzed: 'grel pa 'di yis bsod nams bsags pa gang yin des //
translated: May the merit which I have gained by composing this commentaryüîΩcause the purification of the other world.

original: 'gro ba gzhan dag rnam par dag par byed gyur cig / gtan tshigs thigs pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa bram ze aa tsa tas rnam par sbyar ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'gro ba gzhan dag rnam par dag par byed gyur cig / gtan tshigs thigs pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa bram ze aa tsa tas rnam par sbyar ba rdzogs so /
translated: The commentary on the Hetucakradamaru composed by the Brahmin Achard is completed.

original: // /'dzam gling snying po kha che'i grong khyer du //
analyzed: // /'dzam gling snying po kha che'i grong khyer du //
translated: In the city of Kashmir, the heart of Jambudvipa,

original: mkhas pa'i snying po chos kyi grags pa'i 'grel //
analyzed: mkhas pa'i snying po chos kyi grags pa'i 'grel //
translated: the commentary on the heart of the wise Dharmakirti,

original: dam chos snying po tshad ma bsgyur ba las //
analyzed: dam chos snying po tshad ma bsgyur ba las //
translated: from the translation of the essence of the holy Dharma, the Pramana,

original: snying po med pa rnams kyi snying por shog /
analyzed: snying po med pa rnams kyi snying por shog /
translated: may it be the heart of those without a heart.
